Sentencas: Hydrogen conversion plants based on reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) provide a potential solution for large-scale energy storage to facilitate renewable integration.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: When operating an rSOC plant, the security and performance should be monitored at all times, including the steady-state periods and the transient processes connecting them.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: Model predictive control (MPC) is an appropriate method for this problem.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: This paper presents a comprehensive rSOC plant model to describe the multiscale dynamics (such as temperature and mass flows) under both fuel cell and electrolysis modes.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: Then, a time-varying MPC strategy based on a linear parameter-varying prediction model is proposed to provide fast control to the nonlinear rSOC plant.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: A numerical case is simulated to validate the effects of the proposed MPC strategy.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method

Sentencas: The results suggest that the automatic coordination of actuators ensures consistent stack security, improves both short-term tracking and long-term production performance, and ultimately benefits the plant economically in practical operation.
Titulo: Time-Varying Model Predictive Control of a Reversible-SOC Energy-Storage Plant Based on the Linear Parameter-Varying Method
